Package org.apache.spark.shuffle.sort.io

Class LocalDiskShuffleDataIO

java.lang.Object
org.apache.spark.shuffle.sort.io.LocalDiskShuffleDataIO
All Implemented Interfaces:
ShuffleDataIO
public class LocalDiskShuffleDataIO extends Object implements ShuffleDataIO
Implementation of the ShuffleDataIO plugin system that replicates the local shuffle storage and index file functionality that has historically been used from Spark 2.4 and earlier.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ShuffleDriverComponents
    driver()
    Called once on driver process to bootstrap the shuffle metadata modules that are maintained by the driver.
    ShuffleExecutorComponents
    executor()
    Called once on executor processes to bootstrap the shuffle data storage modules that are only invoked on the executors.
